name: Zapp:Escape From Hollowcell
description:
Embark on a journey into the undead world.

Search the halls of the hollowcell,escape various enemies and rescue your brother from the wizard and his undead army.

Features

.Epic storyline

.Keyboard & Gamepad controls

.High end graphics

.Simple control system

.Multiplayer

.Excellent

.Inbuilt map system

.Play mini games within

Simple yet addicting with a unique storyline

-JayArts Studios
